ygData.subject: Re: Chain/SoW/Accelerando/Root
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I can confirm this.  With SOW on and a long run from North Karana to Qeynos ahead of me, I decided to try to eliminate SOW in some fashion. I chained
ygData.messageBody:
>Something to add, based on my preliminary tests - Chains will
>override all (?) other movement spells, but the previous spells
>icon remains on the screen, which means until it is dispelled/ends/etc,
>you can't selo, only move at normal speed. I didn't test this with all
>the spells, but its definately a case of removing a snare with chains -
>the snare icon remains, and selos has no effect...

I can confirm this. With SOW on and a long run from North Karana to
Qeynos ahead of me, I decided to try to eliminate SOW in some fashion.

I chained myself, yet the SOW icon remained. After chains wore off,
I was moving _normal_ speed, although SOW should have been active.
Trying Selo's at that point did absolutely nothing.

WARNING... do not chain yourself to remove SOW, you will only go
a hell of a lot slower =)

Harmonic Distortion, 35th hell.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
